name: com.castsoftware.uc.analytics.datapond
title: Datapond
description:
Datapond extracts 90% of customers request from CAST into Postgres. It creates 5 tables in CAST_XAPP_TOOLS and expose to any reporting tool. Simple key structure, minimal duplication, and faster and safer access to portfolio data.
Extension required: Python version="3.6.4", AAR version="6.5.0" PostgresODBC (if reporting tool and CAST Postgres are able to communicate with each other but not residing in the same location)
This extension is delivered as-is and the extension is published under GNU LGPL v3 open source license
